title: Assumptions and Bounds in the Instrumental Variable Model. (arXiv:2401.13758v1 [math.ST])
abstract: In this note we give proofs for results relating to the Instrumental Variable (IV) model with binary response $Y$ and binary treatment $X$, but with an instrument $Z$ that takes $K$ states that were originally stated in Richardson & Robins (2014), "ACE Bounds; SEMS with Equilibrium Conditions," arXiv:1410.0470.
context:
Title: Assumptions and Bounds in the Instrumental Variable Model. (arXiv:2401.13758v1 [math.ST])
Abstract: In this note we give proofs for results relating to the Instrumental Variable (IV) model with binary response $Y$ and binary treatment $X$, but with an instrument $Z$ that takes $K$ states that were originally stated in Richardson & Robins (2014), "ACE Bounds; SEMS with Equilibrium Conditions," arXiv:1410.0470.
translated_title: 工具变量模型中的假设和界限
translated_abstract: 在本文中，我们给出了关于具有二进制响应$Y$和二进制处理$X$的工具变量（IV）模型的结果证明，但是仪器$Z$接受$K$个状态，这些状态最初是在Richardson＆Robins（2014）的论文“ACE Bounds; SEMS with Equilibrium Conditions”中提出的（arXiv:1410.0470）。
tldr: 本文证明了在工具变量（IV）模型中，具有二进制响应$Y$和二进制处理$X$的情况下，使用接受$K$个状态的仪器$Z$时，关于ACE界限的结果。
en_tdlr: This paper provides proofs for results regarding the Instrumental Variable (IV) model with binary response $Y$ and binary treatment $X$, but with an instrument $Z$ that takes $K$ states, as originally stated in Richardson & Robins' paper "ACE Bounds; SEMS with Equilibrium Conditions" (arXiv:1410.0470).
